test.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
test.title: The Shawshank Redemption

test.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
test.title: The Silence of the Lambs
